DOC.brief_summary: Study Objective : Training physicians new skill via classroom-based teaching inherent cost time constraint . We seek evaluate whether web-based didactics result similar knowledge improvement retention basic ultrasound principle EFAST ( Extended Focused Assessment Sonography Trauma ) compare traditional method . Methods : Physicians two German emergency department randomize classroom group traditional lecture web group watch narrated lecture online . All participant complete pre- post-test , second post-test eight week later . Both group undergo hands-on training first post-test . A control group complete two initial test without didactic intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Web- Versus Classroom-based Basic Ultrasound Extended Focused Assessment With Sonography Trauma ( EFAST ) Training Two European Hospitals
